title: LFT Jungle main with a wide champion pool - Silver 3
body: Hey I'm LoveTigerLove and I'm currently looking for a serious ranked team to play with that has a set schedule. I'm currently Silver 3 and ranking up slowly and I'm more than willing to play the champions you need as I have a wide champion pool. If you want to know how I can communicate with the team or the times I'm on then please add me on Leauge: LoveTigerLove
